title: Introducing: Kelsy Karter
content:
Super soulful vocal and really high energy songwriting from Kelsy Karter on her latest offering, Out Of Drugs.

There’s a strikingly confident swagger to her sound that’s found relatively rarely and suggests far more to come from the young singer – whilst the production suggests almost ballad territory, lyrically it’s an ode to 21st century love.  Check out Out of Drugs below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
